data.title: Team • 17Capital
data.text:
Daniel joined 17Capital in June 2023 as a Compliance Associate. Daniel joined 17Capital from Quaero Capital LLP where he was a Legal and Compliance Associate. Before this role, he had compliance roles at Antin Infrastructure Partners and Optima Partners Compliance Advisory.

Jennifer joined 17Capital in 2023 and has been working in asset management since 2012. Prior to joining 17Capital, Jennifer worked at Clearlake Capital, Cambridge Associates, Wilshire Associates and Ernst & Young. Jennifer studied at the University of California, San Diego and holds a B.A. in International Studies, Economics and a minor in Accounting.

Anthony joined 17Capital in 2022 from Blackstone, where he was an Associate on the GP Stakes investment team. Prior to Blackstone, Anthony held roles at Warburg Pincus and PwC and studied at Fairfield University.

Edward joined 17Capital in May 2022 as an Intern after graduating from the University of Exeter with a BA in Politics, Philosophy and Economics. He had since joined the firm full time as an Analyst in the Investor Relations team.

Abigail joined 17Capital in July 2023 as a Fund Accountant. Abigail has 6 years’ experience in accounting with most of her career being at Langham Hall, where she started as an Assistant Accountant in 2019 before becoming a Fund Accountant, then earlier this year moving into an Assistant Manager role within their Business Development team.

Alex joined 17Capital in 2022 from AnaCap Financial Partners where he had been a Credit Fund Accountant since May 2020.

Megan joined 17Capital in July 2023 as Associate, Investor Relations. Megan joins us from CVC Capital Partners where she spent 7 years working as a Fund Accountant on both their flagship fund CVC Capital Partners VIII and their Growth Partners I.

Nathalie joined 17Capital in 2022 from The Children’s Investment Fund (TCI). Nathalie started her career working at Natixis for 5 years and has a BA in English from Artois University in France

Benjamin has 11 years’ client service experience during which he spent 8.5 years at Schroders/Cazenove Capital in the Business Development Services and Wealth Management teams. Benjamin has extensive experience covering request for proposals and due diligence questionnaires across public and private markets strategies.

Pauline joined 17Capital in 2021 from Lyxor Asset Management. Pauline has a BA in Management and Business Studies from ESC Reims and a Masters in International Business and Management from ICADE in Madrid.

Nicolò joined 17Capital in 2015 from Adams Street Partners and was previously at Credit Suisse. Nicolò studied at the Bocconi University, Milan and the London School of Economics.

Robert joined 17Capital in 2010 from Merrill Lynch and was previously at Lloyds Banking Group. Robert studied at HEC Paris and The University of Edinburgh.

David joined 17Capital in July 2023 as a Fund Accountant. David has over 20 years’ work experience and has been an accountant for the last 8 years. He joined us from Sovereign Capital Partners where he has been a Fund Accountant for the last 3 years.

Jordan joined 17Capital from Pendal Group, one of Australia’s largest investment managers. Prior to this, Jordan spent over 10 years working at HLB Mann Judd, which is a leading chartered accounting firm. He has a Bachelor of Commerce majoring in Accounting from Macquarie University, Sydney.

Eline joined 17Capital in 2024 from Nomura where she worked as an Investment Banking Analyst in the EMEA Consumer and Retail team. Eline has a bachelor’s and master’s degree in Business Economics from KU Leuven University in Belgium and a master’s in Finance, majoring in Investment Banking, from ESCP Business School.

Haley joined 17Capital in October 2023 as Associate, Investor Relations. Haley joins us from Hamilton Lane, where she was a Consultant Relations Analyst on their Client Solutions team. Haley received a degree in Business Management from Villanova University.

Tyler joined 17Capital in 2023 from Neuberger Berman, where he was a Vice President responsible for raising capital from institutional investors in the eastern United States. He was previously at Fiducient Advisors (formerly known as Fiduciary Investment Advisors) where he was a member of their Investment Manager Research group. Tyler holds a Bachelor of Arts from Trinity College in Hartford, CT.

Hannah joined 17Capital in January and has over 10 years experience in front of house and facilities.

Nick joined 17Capital in 2022 having worked previously at Intermediate Capital Group (ICG) PLC where he was an Associate Director, Funds Finance. Prior to joining ICG in 2018, Nick spent 3 years at Vision Capital and 7 years at Bridgepoint. Nick is a Chartered Management Accountant and a CFA Charterholder and is a graduate of King’s College London.

Drew brings more than 25 years’ experience in the financial services industry to 17Capital. He joins from Hamilton Lane, where he served as Managing Director, Client Solutions Group, and was responsible for raising capital from the largest institutional investors in the United States.

Pierre joined 17Capital in 2018 from Lazard Investment Banking, he previously held positions at Pantheon and AXA Private Equity (Ardian). Pierre studied at the ESSEC Business School & EPF Graduate School of Engineering, Paris as well as at the London School of Economics.

Jen joined 17Capital in 2023 from PwC, where she was an International Tax Director in the Global Structuring-Financial Services team. She studied at Marquette University and the University of Missouri School of Law.

Dane brings nearly two decades of strategic and financing advisory experience across the asset management, alternative asset management and wealth management sectors. He previously served as a Managing Director in the Financial Institutions Group at both RBC Capital Markets and Citigroup.

Greg joined 17Capital in 2019 and previously held roles at Man Group and Conning. Greg studied at Villanova University and Columbia Business School and is a CFA charterholder.

Claire joined 17Capital in 2022 from Goldman Sachs Asset Management (“GSAM”), where she led the ESG Client Strategy Group in London. She has a BA (Hons) in English from the University of Leeds.

Alejandro joined 17Capital from Alberta Investment Management Corporation (AIMCo) and has over 20 years of investments experience, most recently, as a Portfolio Manager in Public Equities. Alejandro holds a Bachelor of Engineering from Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, an MBA from University of Ottawa and is a CFA charterholder.

Javed joined 17Capital in June 2023. Prior to joining 17Capital his recent experience includes Client Services Fund Accounting with IQ-EQ and Audit and Accounting roles with Azets (formally Wilkins Kennedy), Charterhouse Accountants and Sterling Associates.

Mina Kawar joined 17Capital in June 2023 as a Fund Accountant in the Finance team. Mina is joining from Alvarez and Marsal where she was an Associate in the Financial Restructuring Advisory team. Prior to Alvarez and Marsal, Mina worked at Equitix as a Senior Finance Analyst.

Daniel Kettner joined 17Capital in July 2023 as Director, Consultant Relations in New York. Dan has over 21 years’ of experience and a strong background in consultant relations, client services, relationship management, product specialism and investor relations.

Shamyl joined 17Capital in 2022 from CVC Credit Partners where he was VP of Financial Reporting. Shamyl joined CVC in 2019, having previously spent 5 years at CQS and 4 years at Augentius before that.

Caroline joined 17Capital in June 2023 and brings over two decades of experience. She held Investor Relations and Client Service roles previously at Brevet Capital, Fortress Investment Group and Mount Kellett Capital Management. Caroline studied English Literature and Psychology at Binghamton University.

Zaneta joined 17Capital in July 2023 as a Fund Controller. Zaneta has over 12 years’ experience in accounting and business advisory with 7 of those working directly with a diverse portfolio of asset managers, predominantly focused on private equity fund structures.

Louisa joined 17Capital in September 2023 as Director, People. Louisa has over 17 years of recruitment experience in the financial services industry. Joining us from Royal Bank of Canada where she spent 4 years in the HR team with her most recent role as Director, Global HR Business Partner for the Investor and Treasury services team.

Ashling joined 17Cpaital in 2022 from MUFG where she started her career in 2020 after completing her BSc Economics degree at the University of Nottingham.

Claire started her career as an M&A Analyst at Societe Generale, followed by 2 years at Deutsche Bank in the Consumer & Retail Investment Banking team. Claire has a Double Degree Master in Management and MSc in Strategy, Consulting, and Digital Transformation, with a Minor in Finance, from EDHEC Business School.

Naomi joined 17Capital in 2022 from Meta (Facebook) and prior to that spent 8 years at Goldman Sachs in the Credit Risk team.

Jack joined 17Capital in 2022 from Macfarlanes where he was a solicitor in the Investment Management Group. Jack qualified as a solicitor in 2007, working in the Corporate/M&A Team at Latham & Watkins.

James joined 17Capital in 2024 from Mizuho Bank where he spent nearly 10 years in their leveraged finance origination team. Before Mizuho, James worked at the Royal Bank of Scotland and has a Business Management degree from the University of Newcastle-Upon-Tyne.

Charlie joined 17Capital from Mereo BioPharma in London and her most recent role was EA to the Chief Financial Officer and Chief Business Officer.

Nick joins 17Capital from Global Reach Group, a strategic foreign exchange company. Nick has gained experience from previous Data Engineer, BI Development and Project Management roles in a variety of industries including; finance, automobile, media and hospitality.

Martin joined 17Capital in 2020 from CVC Credit Partners and was previously at Bluebay Asset Management and HSBC. Martin studied at the University of Maastricht and is a CFA charterholder.

Andrew joined 17Capital in June 2023 from Barings where he spent the last 9 years primarily as a fundraiser in the EMEA business development team. Andrew studied at Loughborough University and is a CAIA charterholder.

Antonia joins 17Capital from Apax Partners where she held the position of Investor Relations Analyst for the last 2 years. Previously, she worked for 3 years as a Researcher at Results International, a corporate finance advisory firm, and started her career at Graphite Capital.

Sebastiaan joined 17Capital in 2022 after completing his MSc in Financial Economics from the Erasmus School of Economics, Rotterdam, he also has a BSc in Economics and Business Economics from the same school.

Fu joins us from InfraRed Capital Partners where he was Financial Controller for 4 years. Prior to that Fu was with GMT Communications Partners and spent 7 years at Augentius UK (now part of IQ-EQ). Fu has an MSc in Professional Accountancy and is ACCA qualified.

Colleen joined 17Capital in 2024 from William Blair and was previously at Lazard in secondaries advisory. Colleen holds a BBA from Baruch Zicklin School of Business and an M.B.A. from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.

Jonathan joined 17Capital in October 2023 as Director, Consultant Relations EMEA from Schroders Investment Management where he was Consultant Relations Director, Private Assets. Jonathan has a BA (Hons) in Geography from the University of Durham.

Oliver joined 17Capital in 2010 from Reuters plc, he previously held positions at Moore Stephens, Apax Partners and Mourant. Oliver studied at the University of Exeter.

Stephen joined 17Capital in 2019 from Lloyds Banking Group and has worked with private equity managers for almost 20 years. Stephen studied at the University of Ulster.

Bindu has 15 years HR experience and has spent the last 5 years at Rothschilds & Co as a Learning Partner working with Global Advisory, Wealth Management and Merchant Banking to identify, design and execute learning and development activities and solutions.

Isabelle joined 17Capital in 2021 from MUFG where she worked in the Cash and Liquidity Management team. Isabelle has a BA in Italian and Spanish from Cardiff University.

Jenny joins us from ICG where she held the role of Senior Group Reporting Accountant. Prior to that Jenny was with Jupiter Asset Management for almost 6 years and her most recent role was Financial and Regulatory Reporting Manager. She also brings finance experience from her previous roles at CBRE, Mizuho International, HSBC and Haysmacintyre.

Michael joined 17Capital in 2021 from Wells Fargo and was previously at Bank of America Merrill Lynch. Michael studied at the University of Virginia and the McIntire School of Commerce.

Natalie joined 17Capital in 2022 from Deutsche Bank. Natalie has a BA in Philosophy and Modern Languages from Oxford University.

Robert joined 17Capital in 2024 as Finance Assistant having previously worked at IMEX Group. Robert has a bachelor’s degree in Mathematics from the University of Exeter.

Justinas joined 17Capital in 2017 from the Financial Sponsors Group at Barclays. Justinas studied at the Rotterdam School of Management and the University of Exeter.

Gloria has over 6 years’ Finance and Accountancy experience. She joins us from Brookfield Asset Management where she worked as a Senior Accountant.

Rajeev joins 17Capital from BMO Capital Markets where he was an Investment Banking Analyst in M&A since July 2021. Rajeev received a BBA in Finance from the University of Wisconsin-Madison.

Dorian joined 17Capital in August 2023 after graduating from London Business School with a Masters in Finance. Prior to that he worked at PIMCO. Dorian also holds a BSc in Business Administration from the Mannheim University (Germany) and is a CFA charter holder.

Shamini joined 17Capital in September 2023 from Adams Street Partners and studied at Carnegie Mellon University.

Alexandra joined 17Capital in 2018 from Investec and was previously at Close Brothers Group. Alexandra studied at Newcastle University.

Becky joined 17Capital in 2019 from Ernst and Young and studied at Lancaster University.

Mac holds a Bachelor of Science in Management, with concentrations in Finance & Entrepreneurship from the Carroll School of Management, Boston College.

Alyssa Whittam joined 17Capital in July 2023 as a People Associate. Alyssa has over 6 years’ work experience focused primarily in HR within both the financial and professional services industry. Alyssa studied at Nottingham Law School and Nottingham University and holds a LLB (Hons) in Law with Psychology and an MSc in Psychology.

David joined 17Capital in 2019 from J.P. Morgan, having previously held positions at Lehman Brothers and Ernst & Young. David studied at Leeds University and the London Business School.

Carys joined 17Capital in January 2024. Carys previously worked at EY where she worked within the climate change and sustainability services team. Carys studied Economics and the University of Nottingham.

Raisah joined 17Capital in 2022 and has been working in private markets since 2013, and prior to joining 17Capital worked at ICG, MV Credit and Pantheon Ventures. Raisah studied at the School of Oriental and African Studies and holds a BA in Economics and Politics.

Xiufang joined 17Capital in 2022 after graduating with honours from the Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania with an MBA in Finance. She previously worked at Jaguar Growth Partners and Fuson International.
